channel.title: Nets's Coding Help Thread 1
channel.description:
Hello. I am owner/hoster/head coder of the wonderful private server Ancientscape. I think I can consider myself as a semi-advanced to advanced coder as my server usually has 30-70 people on it at average. If you have any errors or questions considering private server coding, you can post here. I will try to answer everybody's questions but if I can't please don't be mad as no one is perfect.
I prefer Pimpscape source but I can try to help with others as well.
Post on. ;)

item.title: Nets's Coding Help Thread 1
item.dc:creator: @looted_drag looted drag
item.description:
@looted_drag wrote:

hi dude its looted drag again…

when i start up my runserver and try to log in i get this error…

Starting CheezScape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594
config\objects.cfg: file not found.
Summoning: Loading monsters from Summon.cfg …
Summoning: Loaded 25 monsters from Summon.cfg!
ClientHandler: Accepted from localhost:1356
Exception in thread “Thread-0” java.lang.UnsupportedClassVersionError: client :
Unsupported major.minor version 8241.8224
at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass1(Native Method)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source)
at java.security.SecureClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source)
at java.net.URLClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source)
at java.net.URLClassLoader.access$000(Unknown Source)
at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source)
at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(Unknown Source)
at PlayerHandler.newPlayerClient(PlayerHandler.java:44)
at server.run(server.java:152)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

what do i do???

in advance looted drag

Read full topic

item.title: Nets's Coding Help Thread 1
item.dc:creator: @Anton Anton
item.description:
@Anton wrote:

if((IsInWilderness = true) && Bare()) {
	teleportToX = 3254;
	teleportToY = 3420;
	sendMessage("Please equip an armour and a weapon before you pk");
}

I have this code to stop people pking bare on my server based on cheezscape Pk. Anyway, I need this code to be ignore if they are already standing at those co-ords (the death spawn co-ords)

If you can give me code that would make it ignore that if the player was already at those co-ords, it would be great.

Thanks in advance - Anton

Read full topic

item.title: Nets's Coding Help Thread 1
item.dc:creator: @Nets8 Nets8
item.description:
@Nets8 wrote:

[quote=“looted drag, post:6, topic:38983”]Hi dude

Well i wanna know… im on Cheezscape and i always get this error when i try and log into it.
also whatever i do i always edit client.java but it never works in the server here is the error i get is…
Exception in thread “main” java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 2
at NPCHandler.loadNPCList(NPCHandler.java:864)
at NPCHandler.(NPCHandler.java:21)
at server.main(server.java:26)
Error: Unable to startup listener on 43594 - port already in use?
Press any key to continue . . .
i am using testscape

i get this on my comiple aswell…
N
ote: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details.
Press any key to continue . . . wot do i do???[/quote]

  1. Error: Unable to startup listener on 43594 - port already in use? means that you already have another one running the exact same thing when you compile. When compiling/running, make sure to close all other command prompts that compile/run for you.

  2. Exception in thread “main” java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 2
    at NPCHandler.loadNPCList(NPCHandler.java:864)
    at NPCHandler.(NPCHandler.java:21)
    at server.main(server.java:26)     means that your autospawn.cfg’s data isn’t lined up correctly, make sure to tab them in between all whole numbers and/or words. Make sure that they are all lined up the same.

Read full topic
